Package iris.imageToBitcode

Class Summary
BitCode A class that stores a bitcode and makes it easy to add one bit at a time
BitcodeGenerator A class that uses Gabor filters to generate a bitcode from an image of an iris The basic idea is to create different Gabor wavelets, defined by the constants a,b,w,x0 and y0 and filter the unwrapped iris with those wavelets.
CirclePointGenerator Returns all points on a circle defined by the input centerpoint and radius
CircleType Defines a cirlce location type, ie a centre (x,y) and a radius
CoordConverter A class that converts from r-theta cooridinates into x-y space given the centerpoint and radii of pupil and iris.
EyeDataType Defines a datatype to be used to reference characteristics of an eye.
GaborParameters  
GaussianFilter A filter which applies Gaussian blur to an image.
ImageProcessor A class for applying filters to an image of an eye
ImageToBitcode Takes in an image and returns a bitcode which can be used to identify an individual.
IrisFinder A class that takes as input an image and extracts the parameters which constrain the iris
LocateIris This class locates the pupil and outer iris boundary.
UnWrapper Extracts and unwraps an iris from an eye image, given the iris inner and outer boundaries
